overview: Teen girls have fantasies just like the rest of us. And naturally, the first place these fantasies come true is in school! It could be in an empty classroom, the gym or even in the principal's office. The six coed hotties in After School Slut Club 2 don't care if it's risky to fuck where they do. They just want to get off! We have sexy basketball player Angie cumming in the locker room after a game. Megan fucks a janitor in an empty classroom! Plus more from nerdy Jean, brunette coquette Jenna, flexible Jessica and petite Lina. They all get loads of cum!
title: After School Slut Club 2
